net.sourceforge.waters.model.module

Interface NodeProxy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<NamedProxy>, ComparableProxy<NamedProxy>, NamedProxy, Proxy
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroupNodeProxy, SimpleNodeProxy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GroupNodeElement, NodeElement, SimpleNodeElement

    public interface NodeProxy
extends NamedProxy

    The base class for all nodes.

    This class serves as a common base for simple nodes (SimpleNodeProxy) and group nodes (GroupNodeProxy) and extends some functionality common to both classes.

    All nodes can be associated with propositions. Propositions are a particular type of event used to define properties of nodes. The common application to define marked or terminal states is achieved by associating each node to be marked with a particular proposition, e.g., :omega. The general node structure supports a list of proposition in order to facilitate several marking conditions to check a model for mutual nonblocking conditions or to perform CTL model checking.

    Author:
    Robi Malik

    • Method Detail

      • getPropositions

        PlainEventListProxy getPropositions()
        Gets the list of propositions of this node.
        Returns:
        An event list that defines the proposition events for this node.

      • getImmediateChildNodes

        Set<NodeProxy> getImmediateChildNodes()
        Gets the set of immediate child nodes of this group node. This method returns the set of simple nodes or group nodes that are directly contained in this group node.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable set of nodes.

      • getAttributes

        Map<String,String> getAttributes()
        Gets the attribute map for this node. The attribute map can be used by tools supporting external model formats to store information that does not appear in standard DES models.
        Returns:
        An immutable map mapping attribute names to values.
